data.title: GRAMMYs 2024: Official Submissions (UPDATING) — The Bulletin
data.meta_description: The official list of confirmed 2024 GRAMMYs submissions. Regularly updated.
data.text:
This post will serve as a compilation of every confirmed submission for the 2024 GRAMMYs. The list will be updated as more information becomes available.

*An asterisk after an artist’s name means that their submissions are incomplete.

Songwriter of the Year, Non-Classical Contenders: Sarah Aarons, Carole Ailin, Andy Albert, Aldae, Jessi Leigh Alexander, Vision Alexander, Edgar Barrera, Evan Bogart, Claudia Brant, Nija Charles, Lauren Christy, Kevyn Mauricio Cruz, Delacey, Jessie Jo Dillon, Dougie F (Douglas Ford), Jessie Early, Feli Ferraro, Jesse Frasure, Jesús Roberto Laija García, Natalie Nicole Gilbert, Ashley Gorley, Charlie Handsome, Michael Hardy, Scott Harris, Jamie Hartman, Jacob Kasher Hindlin, Sarah Hudson, Ethan Hulse, Jason Ingram, Steph Jones, Jozzy, Ilsey Juber, Sean Kennedy, Akil “World Wide Fresh” King, Chris LaCorte, Lauri Laubre, Hillary Lindsey, Madison Love, Mariah Martinez and Dana Victoria Portalatin, Shane McAnally, Maureen “Mozella” McDonald, Josh Miller, Michael Pollack, Sam Roman, Elena Rose, Liz Rose, Jonathan Smith, Sarah Solovay, Jacob Sooter, Mike Spears, Theron Thomas, Justin Tranter, Laura Veltz, Billy Walsh, Diane Warren, Simon Wilcox, Lainey Wilson, Xplicit

Select Best Music Film Contenders: Milli Vanilli (Milli Vanilli), Moonage Daydream (David Bowie), Hallelujah: Leonard Cohen: A Journey, A Song (Leonard Cohen), A Hollywood High (Duran Duran), Bono & The Edge: A Sort of Homecoming with Dave Letterman (U2), San Francisco Sounds: A Place in Time, Meet Me in the Bathroom (Various Artists), If These Walls Could Sing (Various Artists), Ladies First: A Story of Women in Hip-Hop (Various Artists), Mixtape (Various Artists), Elton John Live: Farewell From Dodger Stadium (Elton John), Live at Yankee Stadium (Billy Joel), Amazon Music Live With A$AP Rocky (A$AP Rocky), Live in New York (Guns N’ Roses), Live in Vegas (Imagine Dragons), Home Again – Live From Central Park, New York City, May 26, 1973 (Carole King), Encanto Live at the Hollywood Bowl (Cast of Disney’s Encanto), Louis Armstrong’s Black and Blues (Louis Armstrong), I Go to the Rock: The Gospel Music of Whitney Houston (Whitney Houston), I Am Everything (Little Richard), Dear Mama (Tupac), Love to Love You, Donna Summer (Donna Summer), Wham! (Wham!), TLC Forever (TLC), Clarity Orchestral Concert Documentary (Zedd), Starfall (ILLENIUM), Don’t Make Me Over (Dionne Warwick), What the Hell Happened to Blood, Sweat & Tears (Blood, Sweat & Tears), Trouble Is…25: The Film (Kenny Wayne Shepard), Between Hell & Hallelujah (Wynonna Judd)
